languages.text: "Испытание воли — непреложная часть пути. Пришло время сразиться с собственной слабостью и высечь огонь истинной веры в сердце".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Испытание воли — непреложная часть пути, боец. Пришло время сразиться с собственной слабостью и высечь огонь истинной веры в сердце".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to combat your weakness and light the fire of true faith in your heart."
languages.original_text: "Испытание воли — непреложная часть пути. Пришло время сразиться с собственной слабостью и высечь огонь истинной веры в сердце".

traits.locale_text: "The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to battle your weakness and start the fire of true faith in your heart."
"The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to battle your weakness and start the fire of true faith in your heart."
"The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to combat your weakness and light the fire of true faith in your heart."
"The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to combat your weakness and light the fire of true faith in your heart."
"The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to combat your weakness and light the fire of true faith in your heart."
"The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to combat your weakness and light the fire of true faith in your heart."

languages.text: "Die Prüfung des Willens ist ein unverzichtbarer Teil jeder Reise. Es ist Zeit, Eure Schwäche zu bekämpfen und das Feuer des wahren Glaubens in Eurem Herzen zu entfachen."
languages.original_text: "The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to combat your weakness and light the fire of true faith in your heart."

traits.locale_text: "Die Prüfung des Willens ist ein unverzichtbarer Teil jeder Reise. Es ist Zeit, Eure Schwäche zu bekämpfen und das Feuer des wahren Glaubens in Eurem Herzen zu entfachen."

languages.text: « Le doute fait partie de chaque cheminement. L'heure est venue de vous confronter à votre faiblesse et d'allumer la flamme de la foi véritable dans votre cœur. »
languages.original_text: "The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to combat your weakness and light the fire of true faith in your heart."

traits.locale_text: « Le doute fait partie de chaque cheminement. L'heure est venue de vous confronter à votre faiblesse et d'allumer la flamme de la foi véritable dans votre cœur. »

languages.text: “每场旅途之中，对意志的考验都是不可或缺的一部分。是时候战胜你的弱点，点燃心中真正的信仰之火了。”
languages.original_text: "The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to combat your weakness and light the fire of true faith in your heart."

traits.locale_text: “每场旅途之中，对意志的考验都是不可或缺的一部分。是时候战胜你的弱点，点燃心中真正的信仰之火了。”

languages.text: «La prueba de voluntad es una parte indispensable de todo viaje. Es hora de enfrentarse a la debilidad y encender la llama de la verdadera fe en el corazón».
languages.original_text: "The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to combat your weakness and light the fire of true faith in your heart."

traits.locale_text: «La prueba de voluntad es una parte indispensable de todo viaje. Es hora de enfrentarse a la debilidad y encender la llama de la verdadera fe en el corazón».

languages.text: 「意志の試練は、あらゆる旅において変わらぬ部分だ。今こそ弱さと戦い、あなたの心に真の信仰の火を灯す時なのだ」
languages.original_text: "The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to combat your weakness and light the fire of true faith in your heart."

traits.locale_text: 「意志の試練は、あらゆる旅において変わらぬ部分だ。今こそ弱さと戦い、あなたの心に真の信仰の火を灯す時なのだ」

languages.text: "İrade sınavı, her yolculuğun değişmez bir parçasıdır. Zayıflığınla savaşma ve kalbinde gerçek inancın ateşini yakma zamanı."
languages.original_text: "The trial of will is an immutable part of every journey. It is time to combat your weakness and light the fire of true faith in your heart."

traits.locale_text: "İrade sınavı, her yolculuğun değişmez bir parçasıdır. Zayıflığınla savaşma ve kalbinde gerçek inancın ateşini yakma zamanı."
